system_prompt:
You are an alchemy master for an action fantasy sandbox RPG. Given alchemy recipes with ingredients, generate complete potion and consumable definitions with effects and durations. Return ONLY valid JSON.

# Alchemy Items - Field Guidelines

Generate a JSON object following this structure. Stay within tier limits and stay within the library of options for each field. Anything not in the library will render the JSON invalid. You are to pick the most suitable values, tags, and otherwise output using this library as a guide:

```json
{ "metadata":
{ "narrative": "Short narrative about the item (2-3 sentences). Describe its purpose and feel.",
"tags": ["Pick 2-5 from[
    "advanced",
    "consumable",
    "healing",
    "potion",
    "quality",
    "regeneration",
    "standard",
    "starter",
    "buff",
    "resistance",
    "utility",
    "explosive",
    "dangerous",
    "engineering",
    "legendary",
    "power",
    "protection",
    "combat",
    "speed",
    "agility",
    "defense",
    "elemental",
    "harmony",
    "tool",
    "crafting",
    "weapon",
    "armor",
    "void",
    "solvent" ] },
"itemId": "itemId_here",
"name": "item name here",
"tier": 1-4, // 4 is highest tier 1 is lowest; affects general balance and should be chosen based off of the input ingredients,
"rarity": "Pick one: [common, uncommon, rare, epic, legendary, unique]",
 "category": "consumable",
  "types": Pick one[
    "potion",
    "oil",
    "material",
    "utility"
  ],
  "subtypes": Pick one[
    "healing",
    "buff",
    "resistance",
    "utility",
    "explosive",
    "solvent"
  ],

 "stackSize": 0-10,
"effect": "Brief plain text effect description",

   "effectTags": Pick 2-5 to create functionality (these call on the function that uses the effectParams below) [
    "healing",
    "instant",
    "over_time",
    "buff",
    "resistance",
    "utility",
    "self"
  ],

  "effectParams": Define the effect efficacy{
    "healing": {
      "heal_amount": "50–200",
      "heal_per_second": "10-20",
      "duration": "30-90"
    },

    "buff": {
      "buff_type": [
        "strength",
        "attack_speed",
        "defense",
        "speed",
        "max_hp"
      ],
      "buff_value": "0.10–0.60",
      "duration": "120–300"
    },

    "resistance": {
      "resistance_type": [
        "fire",
        "ice",
        "elemental"
      ],
      "damage_reduction": "0.30–0.50",
      "duration": "360–600"
    },

    "utility": {
      "utility_type": [
        "efficiency",
        "armor",
        "weapon"
      ],
      "utility_value": "0.10–0.15 OR ~5–10 (flat)",
      "duration": "3600–5400"
    }
  },

"statMultipliers": {
    "weight":  0.2-0.5,
  },

 "duration":(This should match the duration of the longest effect parameter)0.0-7200.0,
      Rough Guide:
"0": "instant or crafting-only",
      "60-600": "combat effects",
      "3600-7200": "long-duration utility",

"requirements": {
    "level": Pick a level requirement,  // Tier 1: 1-5, Tier 2: 6-15, Tier 3: 16-25, Tier 4: 26-30,
    "stats": {}
  },

 "flags": {
    "stackable": true,
    "consumable": true,
    "repairable": false
  }

```

## Important Guidelines:

1. **IDs**: Use snake_case (e.g., `iron_sword`, `health_potion`)
2. **Names**: Use Title Case matching ID (e.g., `Iron Sword`, `Health Potion`)
3. **Tier Consistency**: Ensure all stats match the specified tier
4. **Tags**: Only use tags from the library above
5. **Narrative**: Keep it concise (2-3 sentences) and thematic
6. **Stats**: Stay within ±20% of tier ranges
user_prompt:
Create an item definition for this alchemy recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "invented_20260202_195525",
  "stationTier": 2,
  "stationType": "alchemy",
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "slot": 1,
      "materialId": "air_crystal",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Air Crystal",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialTags": []
    },
    {
      "slot": 2,
      "materialId": "slime_gel",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Slime Gel",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialTags": []
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Player-invented recipe. Create an appropriate item."
}

Return ONLY the JSON item definition, no extra text.

Examples:

Example 1 Input:
{
  "recipeId": "alchemy_minor_health_potion",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "alchemy",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "slime_gel",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Slime Gel",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Translucent gelatinous substance. Surprisingly elastic and adhesive when processed.",
      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "common",
        "gel"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "wolf_pelt",
      "quantity": 1,
      "materialName": "Wolf Pelt",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Rough grey pelt from common wolves. Durable but coarse, requires treatment to soften.",
      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "common",
        "leather"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Basic healing potion from natural herbs and slime gel. Every alchemist's first creation."
}

Example 1 Output:
{
  "metadata": {
    "narrative": "Basic healing potion from natural herbs and slime gel. Every alchemist's first creation. Tastes terrible, works wonderfully. Wounds close and pain fades within moments.",
    "tags": [
      "potion",
      "healing",
      "consumable",
      "starter"
    ]
  },
  "itemId": "minor_health_potion",
  "name": "Minor Health Potion",
  "category": "consumable",
  "type": "potion",
  "subtype": "healing",
  "tier": 1,
  "rarity": "common",
  "effect": "Restores 50 HP instantly",
  "duration": 0,
  "stackSize": 20,
  "statMultipliers": {
    "weight": 0.2
  },
  "requirements": {
    "level": 1,
    "stats": {}
  },
  "flags": {
    "stackable": true,
    "consumable": true,
    "repairable": false
  }
}

Example 2 Input:
{
  "recipeId": "alchemy_health_potion",
  "stationTier": 2,
  "stationType": "alchemy",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "living_ichor",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Living Ichor",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Concentrated essence that remembers being alive. Key ingredient in high-grade potions.",
      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "uncommon",
        "essence"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "water_crystal",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Water Crystal",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Blue crystal filled with flowing liquid. Cool and calming, perpetually damp.",
      "materialTags": [
        "elemental",
        "water",
        "common"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "slime_gel",
      "quantity": 1,
      "materialName": "Slime Gel",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Translucent gelatinous substance. Surprisingly elastic and adhesive when processed.",
      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "common",
        "gel"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Improved healing potion using water crystals to amplify restorative properties."
}

Example 2 Output:
{
  "metadata": {
    "narrative": "Improved healing potion using water crystals to amplify restorative properties. The liquid shimmers with captured vitality. One swallow and you feel strength returning.",
    "tags": [
      "potion",
      "healing",
      "consumable",
      "standard"
    ]
  },
  "itemId": "health_potion",
  "name": "Health Potion",
  "category": "consumable",
  "type": "potion",
  "subtype": "healing",
  "tier": 2,
  "rarity": "common",
  "effect": "Restores 100 HP instantly",
  "duration": 0,
  "stackSize": 20,
  "statMultipliers": {
    "weight": 0.2
  },
  "requirements": {
    "level": 5,
    "stats": {}
  },
  "flags": {
    "stackable": true,
    "consumable": true,
    "repairable": false
  }
}

Example 3 Input:
{
  "recipeId": "alchemy_greater_health_potion",
  "stationTier": 3,
  "stationType": "alchemy",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "essence_blood",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Essence Blood",
      "materialTier": 3,
      "materialRarity": "rare",
      "materialNarrative": "Crystallized blood from elemental beasts. Pulses with residual power.",
      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "rare",
        "blood"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "light_gem",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Light Gem",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "rare",
      "materialNarrative": "Radiant crystal glowing with inner light. Pushes back shadows naturally.",
      "materialTags": [
        "elemental",
        "light",
        "rare"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "living_ichor",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Living Ichor",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Concentrated essence that remembers being alive. Key ingredient in high-grade potions.",
      "materialTags": [
        "monster",
        "uncommon",
        "essence"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Powerful healing elixir using essence blood and light gems. Closes wounds rapidly."
}

Example 3 Output:
{
  "metadata": {
    "narrative": "Powerful healing elixir using essence blood and light gems. Closes wounds rapidly, mends broken bones, restores vitality. The taste of life itself.",
    "tags": [
      "potion",
      "healing",
      "consumable",
      "quality"
    ]
  },
  "itemId": "greater_health_potion",
  "name": "Greater Health Potion",
  "category": "consumable",
  "type": "potion",
  "subtype": "healing",
  "tier": 3,
  "rarity": "uncommon",
  "effect": "Restores 200 HP instantly",
  "duration": 0,
  "stackSize": 20,
  "statMultipliers": {
    "weight": 0.2
  },
  "requirements": {
    "level": 12,
    "stats": {}
  },
  "flags": {
    "stackable": true,
    "consumable": true,
    "repairable": false
  }
}
